trans-unit.source: SQL Database Downlevel Clients Support for Auditing and Dynamic Data Masking | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: SQL Database Downlevel Clients Support for Auditing and Dynamic Data Masking | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: SQL Database Downlevel Clients Support for Auditing and Dynamic Data Masking
trans-unit.target: SQL Database Downlevel Clients Support for Auditing and Dynamic Data Masking

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Auditing</linkText><title></title> and <linkText>Dynamic Data Masking</linkText><title></title> work with SQL clients that support TDS redirection.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Auditing</linkText><title></title> and <linkText>Dynamic Data Masking</linkText><title></title> work with SQL clients that support TDS redirection.

trans-unit.source: Any client which implements TDS 7.4 should also support redirection.
trans-unit.target: Any client which implements TDS 7.4 should also support redirection.

trans-unit.source: Exceptions to this include JDBC 4.0 in which the redirection feature is not fully supported and Tedious for Node.JS in which redirection was not implemented.
trans-unit.target: Exceptions to this include JDBC 4.0 in which the redirection feature is not fully supported and Tedious for Node.JS in which redirection was not implemented.

trans-unit.source: For "Downlevel clients", i.e. which support TDS version 7.3 and below - the server FQDN in the connection string should be modified:
trans-unit.target: For "Downlevel clients", i.e. which support TDS version 7.3 and below - the server FQDN in the connection string should be modified:

trans-unit.source: Original server FQDN in the connection string: <server name>.database.windows.net
trans-unit.target: Original server FQDN in the connection string: <server name>.database.windows.net

trans-unit.source: Modified server FQDN in the connection string: <server name>.database.secure.windows.net
trans-unit.target: Modified server FQDN in the connection string: <server name>.database.secure.windows.net

trans-unit.source: A partial list of "Downlevel clients" includes:
trans-unit.target: A partial list of "Downlevel clients" includes:

trans-unit.source: JDBC 4.0 and below (while JDBC 4.0 does support TDS 7.4, the TDS redirection feature is not fully supported)
trans-unit.target: JDBC 4.0 and below (while JDBC 4.0 does support TDS 7.4, the TDS redirection feature is not fully supported)

trans-unit.source: Remark: The above server FDQN modification may be useful also for applying a SQL Server Level Auditing policy without a need for a configuration step in each database (Temporary mitigation).
trans-unit.target: Remark: The above server FDQN modification may be useful also for applying a SQL Server Level Auditing policy without a need for a configuration step in each database (Temporary mitigation).
